questions.question: Have you written SQL queries for data analysis?
Are you comfortable cleaning data using Excel or Python?
Have you used Pandas or NumPy for data manipulation?
Do you understand basic statistics (mean, median, variance)?
Have you created dashboards using Power BI, Tableau, or similar?
Do you know how to visualize data effectively?
Have you worked with real-world datasets?
Do you understand KPIs and business metrics?
Have you presented data insights to others?
Have you automated any data reports?
